quotes.text: Always code as if the guy who ends up maintaining your code will be a violent psychopath who knows where you live.
quotes.author: Martin Golding

quotes.text: All computers wait at the same speed.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: A misplaced decimal point will always end up where it will do the greatest damage.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: A good programmer looks both ways before crossing a one-way street.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: A computer program does what you tell it to do, not what you want it to do.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: "Intel Inside" is a Government Warning required by Law.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Common sense gets a lot of credit that belongs to cold feet.
quotes.author: Arthur Godfrey

quotes.text: Chuck Norris counted to infinity... twice.

quotes.text: C is quirky, flawed, and an enormous success.
